sourcesContent:
{users.length > 0 ? ( {users.map((user) => ( {user.firstName} {user.lastName}

Username: {user.username}

Email: {user.email}

Phone: {user.phone}

Role: {user.role ? user.role.name : 'No role assigned'}

Status: {user.status}

handleDelete(user._id)} style={{ textDecoration: 'none', color: 'white', backgroundColor: '#d32f2f', padding: '8px 20px', borderRadius: '4px', fontWeight: 'bold', display: 'inline-block', transition: 'background-color 0.3s', }} onMouseEnter={(e) => (e.target.style.backgroundColor = '#c62828')} onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.target.style.backgroundColor = '#d32f2f')} > Delete ))} ) : ( No users found. )}
